instruction: Quickly edit the following text to reduce its length while still preserving the same meaning.
input: John, who is a struggling mathematician, has a chance to make a mark on the world of mathematics when he stumbles onto a revolutionary theorem. He is unfortunately prevented from publishing his work because a corrupt professor wants to keep it a secret for his own power and fame.
output: John, a struggling mathematician, has a chance to make a mark on mathematics when he finds a revolutionary theorem. But a corrupt professor suppresses it for his own gain.
